content: > please note that the paid pdf is a > print-friendly ad-free version of > the pattern it does not contain the > photo tutorial only the charts the banksia baby blanket is constructed using a 3-round repeat the resulting fabric is lacy without being too holey and reminds me of many trips to the seaside and even one cruise the whipsiderry border adds some contrast both in the form of colour and surface texture the pattern is for a baby blanket but you can easily make it much bigger if you prefer the pattern is available for free on my website us terminology you can also buy the print-friendly written-only **us** pdf in my ravelry store for a nominal fee lots of love dedri
